lead_paragraph: France’s highest court ruled that judicial phone taps between former President Nicolas Sarkozy and his main lawyer were admissible as evidence.

headline.print_headline: France: Court Ruling Deals Sarkozy a Legal Setback
headline.main: France: Court Ruling Deals Sarkozy a Legal Setback

snippet: France’s highest court ruled that judicial phone taps between former President Nicolas Sarkozy and his main lawyer were admissible as evidence.
